response.original_title: Curious George: Takes a Job and More Monkey Business!
response.overview: Curious George is back with even more fun and excitement from his Daytime Emmy-nominated* PBS KIDS TV series. George knows that there are a lot of different jobs that people can do. How can he decide what he wants to be unless he tries them all? Including 8 shows narrated by Primetime Emmy Award winner** William H. Macy, Curious George is on duty as everyone's favorite monkey in Curious George Takes a Job and More Monkey Business! * 2006 Daytime Emmy Awards, Outstanding Children's Animated Program. ** 2003 Outstanding Lead Actor and Outstanding Writer, Door to Door.
response.title: Curious George: Takes a Job and More Monkey Business!
